svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;

style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontStyle=1" value="リクエストボディ" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="110" x="760" y="570" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="qdrxoq5kDe7lP1pZSrOh-86" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontSize=16;spacing=15;" value="<div style="line-height: 200%;">{<div><span style="white-space: pre;">	"<b>query</b>" : "</span></div><div><span style="caret-color: rgb(255, 0, 0); white-space: pre;"><span style="font-weight: bold; white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;"><b>	</b><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">query</span><b> </b></span><b>MyOperation</b></span><span style="white-space: pre;"> ($id: ID!) {</span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	<span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>getUser (id: $id) {</span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	<span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>id</span><br></span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	name</span><br></span></span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	<span style="white-space: pre;">	</span></span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	age</span><br></span></span></span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	<span style="white-space: pre;">	</span></span>}</span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	<span style="white-space: pre;">	</span></span>}</span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	query <b style="color: rgb(255, 0, 0);">MyAnotherOperation</b> {</span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	getAllUsers {</span></span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	id</span><br></span></span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	name</span><br></span></span></span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	age</span><br></span></span></span></span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>}</span><br></span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>}</span><br></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>",</span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>"<b>variables</b>": {"id": "100"},</span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>"<b>operationName</b>": "<font color="#ff0000"><span style="caret-color: rgb(255, 0, 0);"><b>MyAnotherOperation</b></span></font>"<br></span><div>}</div></div></div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="647.5" width="365" x="775" y="616.25" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell value="operationNameでどちらの操作を<div>実行したいか指定する必要がある</div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="60" width="240" x="940" y="1050" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 108px; height: 1px; padding-top: 115px; margin-left: 41px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 337px; height: 1px; padding-top: 470px; margin-left: 70px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 320px; height: 1px; padding-top: 50px; margin-left: 75px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 20px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
クエリ
~ 複数操作が含まれているクエリ ~

switch.text: クエリ ~ 複数操作が含まれているクエリ ~

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 0, 0), rgb(255, 144, 144)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(255, 0, 0), rgb(255, 144, 144));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 610px; margin-left: 221px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #FF0000; background-color: #ffffff;

display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#FF0000, #ff9090); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; background-color: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
operationNameでどちらの操作を
実行したいか指定する必要がある

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
